dishes.name: Stuffed Artichokes
dishes.description: Stuffed with ricotta, garlic, and all sorts of other deliciousness. As a bonus, the artichokes are full of nutrients.

dishes.name: Jalapeno Popper Wontons
dishes.description: These jalapeno popper wontons are a quick and easy appetizer. If you enjoy a little spice, they are an ideal fit.

dishes.name: Hot Ham and Cheese Party Rolls
dishes.description: The ham, cheese, and pizza dough combine in the oven for a melty, yet crispy ensemble.

dishes.name: Meatball Stuffed Buns
dishes.description: A spin on the traditional meatball, these meatball stuffed buns are warm and filling.

dishes.name: Sweet Potato Bites
dishes.description: The sweet potatoes are thinly sliced and baked into chips and then topped with guacamole and crisp bacon.

dishes.name: Honey Garlic Chicken Skewers
dishes.description: Coated in a tasty marinade of honey, soy sauce, vinegar, ginger, and garlic, these skewers are full of flavor. 2 options of baking and grilling them.

dishes.name: Garlic Herb Roasted Shrimp
dishes.description: Paired with a homemade cocktail sauce, this garlic-herb roasted shrimp is a step up from the usual cocktail shrimp appetizer.

dishes.name: Parmesan Crusted Tortellini Bites
dishes.description: They consist of delicious bite-sized tortellini that is filled with cheese, fried, and then dipped in marinara.

dishes.name: Blackened Shrimp Avocado Cucumber Bites
dishes.description: The shrimp are seasoned and seared in a cast-iron pan, and then placed on cucumber slices covered in creamy avocado.

dishes.name: Crescent Sausage Bites
dishes.description: Fry up some ground sausage, fold in some cream cheese, and then sandwich between two layers of crescent rolls.

dishes.name: Bacon Crackers
dishes.description: With butter crackers as the base and then a thick layer of candied bacon, this is the perfect finger food appetizer.

dishes.name: Firecracker Chicken Meatballs
dishes.description: Sweet, savory, and spicy, these firecracker chicken meatballs are one of the best appetizers and sure to impress.

dishes.name: Loaded Queso Fundido
dishes.description: “Mexican fondue,” this queso has a ton of flavor and is perfect for dipping chips, crackers, and bread.

dishes.name: Bacon Double Cheeseburger Dip
dishes.description: Allow you to experience all the yummy goodness of a bacon cheeseburger in dip form!

dishes.name: Mac and Cheese Bites
dishes.description: Mac and cheese bites are a great finger food to serve, If you love it, you should try it.

dishes.name: Watermelon, Olive and Feta Salad
dishes.description: The perfect summer salad of melon, olives and feta cheese with toasted pumpkin seeds.

dishes.name: Carrot Salad with Black Grape Dressing
dishes.description: A quick carrot salad with a freshly made black grape dressing.

dishes.name: BBQ Potato Salad
dishes.description: The good old potato salad with a twist! This one has a cola flavored BBQ sauce as a dressing ingredient.

dishes.name: Thai Soyabean In Cabbage Cups
dishes.description: This low fat salad recipe is your perfect companion! A mash up of soy granules and oriental flavours, served in cabbage cups.

dishes.name: Asian Sesame Chicken
dishes.description: A salad of chicken strips, greens, almonds, sesame seeds and asparagus. With some soya sauce, vinegar and chilly oil.

dishes.name: Cucumber, Black Olive and Mint Salad
dishes.description: A chunky salad of cucumbers, cherry tomatoes, peppery mint leaves drizzled with a black olive sauce.

dishes.name: Caesar Salad
dishes.description: This classic Caesar salad is not just easy to make but the perfect mix of cream and crunch.

dishes.name: Tomato Olive Salad
dishes.description: Fresh crunchiness and juiciness of tomatoes and taste of olives is enough to make you drool over.

dishes.name: Cedar-Plank Salmon
dishes.description: A big salmon fillet always feels like a festive main course, when it's cooked on a cedar grilling plank.

dishes.name: Braised Chicken Legs With Grapes and Fennel
dishes.description: This easy sweet-and-spicy braise, made with ribbons of fennel and juicy table grapes. Have a loaf of bread for sopping up the sauce.

dishes.name: Seared Scallops With Brown Butter and Lemon Pan Sauce
dishes.description: Scallops are always a stunner, but these are dead simple to make: Juice lemons.

dishes.name: Grilled Pork Spareribs With Soda Bottle Barbecue Sauce
dishes.description: Barbecue brisket is a whole ordeal, meaty flavor faster if you focus on tender pork spareribs.

dishes.name: Marinated Chicken Breasts With Grilled Pineapple Relish
dishes.description: Marinate the chicken in advance and you have one of those perfectly summery.

dishes.name: Tamarind-Glazed Black Bass With Coconut-Herb Salad
dishes.description: Two whole fish are brushed with a tamarind and honey glaze, then roasted.

dishes.name: Stuffed Eggplants and Zucchini in a Rich Tomato Sauce
dishes.description: Spiced ground lamb and cooked in an oniony tomato sauce. Top it off with crispy garlic, herbs, and yogurt.

dishes.name: Instant Pot Lamb Haleem
dishes.description: A warmly spiced, thick stew made from long-simmered lentils, barley, and bone-in chunks of lamb or goat.

dishes.name: Mango lassi
dishes.description: Mango, yogurt and milk combine in creamy harmony making those sweltering afternoons.

dishes.name: Pina colada
dishes.description: The drink brings you closer to a beach and sipping this mixture of coconut milk, pineapple juice and rum.

dishes.name: Coconut water
dishes.description: You can eat its flesh raw or flaked and cook with its oil, but best is to stick a straw inside and drink.

dishes.name: Champagne
dishes.description: Champagne is the diamond of the drink world, taking its place on the podium as the beverage.

dishes.name: Chocolate Milkshake
dishes.description: The amount of energy spent trying to slurp this thick sludge up the straw must burn off at least a few of those calories.

dishes.name: Lemonade
dishes.description: If you can ignore the five spoons of sugar in your glass, it's been said to aid digestion, relieve heartburn and etc.

dishes.name: Coca-Cola
dishes.description: It's the original, with a brain-freezing, nasal-passage-penetrating kick that keeps 'em coming back for more.

dishes.name: Water
dishes.description: The mere addition of bubbles transforms plain old H2O into a stylish 'beverage'.

dishes.name: Chocolate-Mint Bars
dishes.description: For a more grown-up taste, you can substitute dark chocolate chips for some or all of the semisweet chocolate chips in the glaze.

dishes.name: Lemon-Scented Blueberry Cupcakes
dishes.description: Studded with plump, juicy fresh berries, these cupcakes are fun for special occasions.

dishes.name: Bourbon-Pecan Tart with Chocolate Drizzle
dishes.description: Pecan pie is often purely sweet with no undertones, but the bourbon, molasses, and chocolate in this beautiful centerpiece dessert.

dishes.name: Raspberry-Rhubarb Pie
dishes.description: Sweet raspberries do that job perfectly here, while a splash of crème de cassis adds even deeper berry flavor.

dishes.name: Classic Fudge-Walnut Brownies
dishes.description: Large chocolate chunks create big, luxurious pockets of melty chocolate in the brownies.

dishes.name: Nathan’s Lemon Cake
dishes.description: Wonderful texture, assertive lemon flavor, just enough richness and just enough icing.

dishes.name: Blueberry-Peach Cobbler
dishes.description: Like a blueberry muffin canoodling with fresh peaches

dishes.name: Roasted Banana Bars with Browned Butter–Pecan Frosting
dishes.description: The bananas flavor the light-and-fluffy bars, which are topped with cream cheese icing and chopped pecans for the perfect amount of tanginess and crunch.
